snippet: Maryland on Thursday became the first state south of the Mason-Dixon line to abolish the death penalty.
abstract: Maryland becomes first state south of Mason-Dixon line to abolish death penalty, after Gov Martin O'Malley signs bill repealing capital punishment.
lead_paragraph: Maryland on Thursday became the first state south of the Mason-Dixon line to abolish the death penalty.

headline.seo: Maryland: Governor Signs Repeal of the Death Penalty
headline.main: Maryland: Governor Signs Repeal of the Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Governor Signs Repeal of the Death Penalty
